roleset.name: not remember

example.name: forget an NP
example.text: The results topped analysts' expectations and the earnings growth of competitors, prompting traders to all but forget the product-launch delays that bogged down the company for much of the past two years.
example.arg: the product-launch delays that bogged down the company for much of the past two years

example.name: forget a clause
example.text: They found they had bought stock from limit orders that they might have entered weeks or months earlier and had forgotten to cancel.

example.name: prepositional variant
example.text: On Oct. 19, 1987, [some investors]-1 learned the consequences of entering ``good-til-canceled limit orders'' and then *trace*-1 forgetting about them.

roleset.note: Frames file for 'forget' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry.
